forum.name: bugs and glitches

forum.latestCommentText: im on index and that way be the problem. other people can drop them in.

thread.title: no arms in camera object

comments.text: when i make a camera stream to desktop it wont show avatar arms there. i want to record so need arms
in the camera options, can you please check if "i'm invisible" is ticked, and if so untick it?
i was invisible so unchecked but the problem remains
a correction! i wasnt seeing arms because i was going to the steam menu to see desktop where the arms are relaced by the wands so they disappeared. the arms do work normally. sorry

thread.latestCommentText: a correction! i wasnt seeing arms because i was going to the steam menu to see desktop where the arms are relaced by the wands so they disappeared. the arms do work normally. sorry
